title: Targum Jonathan on Deuteronomy
versionTitle: Yalkut, Sifsei Chachomim Chumash, Metsudah Publications, 2009
text: To the peace. To the Beis HaMikdosh which is the house of rest and inheritance of the land.
Take heed. Be careful to fix the times of the festivals, to make leap years and ensure that the season of spring occurs in the month of spring … and you will eat the Pesach sacrifice at night.
From every evil thing. From idolatry, sexual immorality and murder.
Varying weight stones. Large stones to weigh items for purchase, and small stones to weigh items for sale.
